column5: I've read a 1000 websites, links, threads regarding the ice out conditions this year. Anyone have any input as to whether planes will be on the water by 5/21? I'm hearing Howie Bay on Red Lake is most likely not going to happen.
Planes are flying now. They are taking off and landing on the river
Thanks for the update. I was told yesterday Chimo Air and Showwalters still have their planes in storage. hmmm.
There are planes flying off the river and ways to get to any lake that has enough water to land and take-off. Your outfitter or air service will be able to give you ideas on who to call.
